## Problem 2

Put numbers into variables, do simple math on the variables 

```{r}

marsha <- 1
abc <- 8745416786468465646

marsha + abc 


cats <- 476 
dogs <- 8.3 

cats / dogs 

class <- 33 
teacher <- 87 

class - teacher 

high <- 10246839295 
low <- 376782853 

high * low 
```
